doc:
Tim Moore (comedian) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Moore_(comedian) 0 Tim Moore (December 9, 1887 – December 13, 1958) was an American vaudevillian and comic actor of the first half of the 20th century. He gained his greatest recognition in the starring role of George "Kingfish" Stevens in the CBS TV's The Amos 'n' Andy Show. He proudly stated, "I've made it a point never to tell a joke on stage that I couldn't tell in front of my mother." Tim_Moore ( December_9_,_1887 – December_13_,_1958 ) was an_American_vaudevillian and comic_actor of the_first_half of the_20th_century . He gained his_greatest_recognition in the_starring_role of George_"_Kingfish_"_Stevens in the_CBS_TV 's The_Amos_'n'_Andy_Show .
